name: places/ChIJW6gNE9JZwokR3BlndenwMoU
formattedAddress: 419 Park Ave S, New York, NY 10016, USA
adrFormatAddress: 419 Park Ave S, New York, NY 10016-8410, USA

originalText.text: Outstanding experience with Arbolus! Received a cordial invite to participate in some consulting followed by a timely live follow up with Hannah. She was kind, clear in her explanation of the process, and thoughtful of my time. Likewise, the Arbolus online experience was top-notch with clear and easy registration, scheduling and billing. Highly recommend.

Highly recommend.

originalText.text:
SCAM: Zero. Customer. Service.

UPDATE:

Third request. No payment.

I have sent a 2nd request on 9/6 to the email you provided and still haven't been contacted by Arbolus. Are there no confirmation emails that get sent out?

ORIGINAL:
After completing an assignment, payment was never made. The NY rep that I spoke with has ghosted me and does not respond to my inquiries. My emails to customer service seem to go into the ether. What kind of professionalism is this?

originalText.text: Very professional, Arbolus supplied me some additional basic information and I was able to expand my conversation with the client. Hannah and her team are great to work with, they take care of any additional requested information necessary for me to assist the client.

text.text: Very professional, Arbolus supplied me some additional basic information and I was able to expand my conversation with the client. Hannah and her team are great to work with, they take care of any additional requested information necessary for me to assist the client.

originalText.text: Serial solicitors who attempt to extract data, time, and experience for free from salaried workers under the guise of being paid for all of the above. You will be repeatedly hassled to provide your insights. They bombard your inbox for more of your intel. I have 3 emais from a "Biplab" just from the last 3 days. Too bad they don't put this much energy into paying out their clients. Flatout scam.

You will be repeatedly hassled to provide your insights. They bombard your inbox for more of your intel. I have 3 emais from a "Biplab" just from the last 3 days. Too bad they don't put this much energy into paying out their clients. Flatout scam.

originalText.text: SNEAKY PAYMENT PRACTICES. Beware of this service. They contacted me via LinkedIn to set up a consulting call for one of their clients. We agreed on a rate, I had to set up the account, submit paperwork for payment etc, email back and forth with their multiple team members, and finally had the call with the client. Only after all of this did they mention that payment was 30 days after you give the consulting, and only until I received payment a month later did I find out that they prorate the agreed-upon fee to the duration of the call. When I asked about this, they just say “it’s in our payment terms”. It says a lot about a company when they are not completely upfront and transparent about their policies. There is way too much time spent on getting everything set up for them to pay you a fraction of the agreed fee. Completely dishonest. Don’t use them!!!
